detail.content: Honda's 2018 NM4 is a great way to see the world on two wheels the most comfortable way possible. Weighing in at 562 pounds in running order, the 2018 Honda NM4 comes equipped with a 670cc engine with a 3.0 gallon fuel capacity. Get a second opinion to see if this is the cruiser for you!
